This Project was Created for Regional Level Technical Project Competition Dated on 13th April 2022, Organized at Government Polytechnic Amravati.

1) Mukta Pathak 
2) Kalyani Kolte 
3) Tejas Bhagwat


 Description: 


we have voice Board, which focuses on apprising your notice on a notice board, but differently. It uses voice input, convert it into text and displays on LCD screen. ESP32 does the whole thing, it's acting as a web server which helps to send data and get response. Here, encoding takes place to send something readable to the board.


 Input data is transmitted over HTTP, from Android to Server. Such display boards can be used as per requirement.
